it's angel in today's DIY video I'm
going to show you how to make a bubble
tea mason jar tumbler now I decided to
make this video because I could not for
the life of me buy any place vessel a
bubble tea tumbler or any sort of bubble
TV useable container so I decided that I
would make one myself and show you guys
how because it's actually really easy
and of course note tumbler or no bubble
tea tumbler would be complete without a
bubble tea lid that fit a thick bubble
tea straw now before you started I just
wanted to say a quick thank you to those

so with that let's get started on this
DIY which is really cool and of course
with any DIY like this safety first so
even though this isn't dangerous
we should always wear eye protection
just in case and kids if you want to try
this at home make sure to ask your
parents first start with the plastic
wide mouth mason jar lid and place the
lid over some cardboard or another shop
like working surface and with the
Sharpie pen mark and draw a circle where
you want your bubble tea straw to go
next put on some gloves to protect your
hands and with a small nail gently
hammer and tap the nail to puncture a
small hole through the circle this will
help as a starter hole for our larger
drill bit next I'm going to use a 5/32
drill bit and drill right over my
starter hole this opening is going to be
super helpful for the next drill bit
which has an even larger tip remove that
drill bit and now attach a titanium step
drill bit which works great on plastic
and it'll give us a nice half-inch
opening for our straw when you get close
to half an inch go slow and if you need
to drill from the other side of the lid
to make a clean opening
then double-check with the real bubble
tea straw to see if it fits you can
always make the opening larger if you'd
like to finally wash the lid and your
mason jar with hot soapy water before
filling it up with some chewy boba and
your favorite milk tea and that's it
that is how you make your own DIY bubble
tea mason jar tumbler now if you guys
want to try this at home I will post
links to all of the accessories in the
drill bit that you need to make this at
home and if you do try this please
please please send me a photo of you and
